content: Screw Politics time to think not sink Let me preface: ‘I think any neo-Nazi, White Supremacy, KKK, Skinhead, movement(s) etcetera are an ignominious blight on a just and free society.’ …O’Neil But every American need ask themselves — in the event of a terrorist attack by Jihadi radicals, would these (above mentioned) radicals, side with the United States, or with the Islamic radicals? So… is my endogenous enemy, who is the enemy of my exogenous enemy, my friend? Well no — But neither is the endogenous, disingenuous purveyor of Yellow Journalism — for political gain — at the cost of America’s safety, my friend either.  addendum: Remember this Pyke ? ThinkProgress Editor: 'I Hope Roger Ailes Dies Slow, Painful, and Soon' - BreitbartSIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER I hope Roger Ailes dies slow, painful, and soon. The evil that…www.breitbart.com
